mapper.select:
SELECT count(distinct aj.`id`) FROM `autoexec_job` aj
LEFT JOIN `autoexec_combop` ac ON aj.`operation_id` = ac.`id`

SELECT ac.`name`, ac.`uk`, COUNT(1) as referenceCount FROM `autoexec_job` aj LEFT JOIN `autoexec_combop` ac ON aj.`operation_id` = ac.`id`
GROUP BY ac.id order by ac.`uk` desc limit #{startNum}, #{pageSize}

sql.if: and (rai.`name` like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or ajpn.`host` like concat('%',#{keyword},'%'))

mapper.select:
SELECT ajpn.`id`, ajpn.`job_phase_id` AS jobPhaseId, ajpn.`host`, ajpn.`port`, ajpn.`start_time` AS startTime, ajpn.`end_time` AS endTime, ajpn.`status`, ajpn.`protocol`, ajpn.`resource_id` AS resourceId, rai.`id` AS nodeId, rai.name AS nodeName, arm.`runner_id` AS runnerId, ajpn.`user_name` AS userName, ap.`url` AS runnerUrl FROM `autoexec_job_phase_node` ajpn LEFT JOIN `autoexec_job_phase` ajp ON ajpn.`job_phase_id` = ajp.`id` LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ri.id AS id, ri.name ,rii.`ip` FROM ${schemaName}.`resource_ipobject_ip` rii LEFT JOIN ${schemaName}.`resource_ipobject` ri ON rii.`resource_id` = ri.`id` ) rai ON ajpn.resource_id = rai.id LEFT JOIN `autoexec_job_phase_node_runner` ajpnr ON ajpn.id = ajpnr.`node_id` LEFT JOIN `autoexec_runner_map` arm ON ajpnr.`runner_map_id` = arm.`id` LEFT JOIN `autoexec_runner` ap ON arm.`runner_id` = ap.`id`
limit #{startNum}, #{pageSize}

SELECT count(ajpn.`id`) FROM `autoexec_job_phase_node` ajpn LEFT JOIN `autoexec_job_phase` ajp on ajpn.`job_phase_id` = ajp.`id` LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ri.id AS id, ri.name ,rii.`ip` FROM ${schemaName}.`resource_ipobject_ip` rii LEFT JOIN ${schemaName}.`resource_ipobject` ri ON rii.`resource_id` = ri.`id` ) rai ON ajpn.resource_id = rai.id LEFT JOIN `autoexec_job_phase_node_runner` ajpnr ON ajpn.id = ajpnr.`node_id` LEFT JOIN `autoexec_runner_map` arm ON ajpnr.`runner_map_id` = arm.`id`

SELECT `id`, `job_id` as jobId, `status`, `start_time` as startTime, `end_time` as endTime, `exec_user` as execUser, `exec_mode` as execMode, `name` as name, `error_msg` as errorMsg, `sort`, `uk` as uk FROM `autoexec_job_phase` where `job_id` = #{value} ORDER BY `sort`, `name` ASC
SELECT `job_phase_id` as jobPhaseId, `status`, COUNT(1) AS `count` FROM `autoexec_job_phase_node` WHERE `job_id` = #{value} GROUP BY `job_phase_id`, `status`

SELECT aj.`id`, aj.`name`, aj.`status`, aj.`error_msg` as errorMsg, aj.`plan_start_time` as planStartTime, aj.`start_time` as startTime, aj.`end_time` as endTime, aj.`operation_id` as operationId, aj.`operation_type` as operationType, aj.`exec_user` as execUser, aj.`source`, aj.`thread_count` as threadCount, aj.`param_hash` as paramHash, aj.`config` as configStr FROM `autoexec_job` aj WHERE aj.`id` = #{value}
SELECT id, job_id as jobId, `status` FROM `autoexec_job_phase` WHERE id = #{value} FOR UPDATE
SELECT id, job_id as jobId, exec_mode as execMode, `sort`, `status` FROM `autoexec_job_phase` WHERE `job_id` = #{jobId} and `name` = #{jobPhaseName} FOR UPDATE
select id, job_id as jobId, `name` from `autoexec_job_phase` where job_id = #{value} order by `sort` asc limit 1

SELECT aj.`id`, aj.`name`, ajpc.`content` AS paramStr, ajp.`id` AS phaseId, ajp.`name` AS phaseName, ajp.`uk` AS phaseUk, ajpo.`id` AS operationId, ajpo.`uk` AS operationUk, ajpo.`name` AS operationName, ajpo.type AS operationType, ajpo.parser, ajpo.`exec_mode` AS execMode, ajpo.`fail_policy` AS failPolicy, ajpc1.`content` AS operationParam FROM `autoexec_job` aj LEFT JOIN `autoexec_job_param_content` ajpc ON aj.`param_hash` = ajpc.`hash` LEFT JOIN `autoexec_job_phase` ajp ON aj.`id` = ajp.`job_id` LEFT JOIN `autoexec_job_phase_operation` ajpo ON ajp.`id` = ajpo.`job_phase_id` LEFT JOIN `autoexec_job_param_content` ajpc1 ON ajpo.`param_hash` = ajpc1.`hash` where aj.`id` = #{jobId} and ajp.`name` = #{phaseName}

SELECT aj.`id`, aj.`name`, aj.`status`, aj.`error_msg` as errorMsg, aj.`plan_start_time` as planStartTime, aj.`start_time` as startTime, aj.`end_time` as endTime, aj.`operation_id` as operationId, aj.`operation_type` as operationType, aj.`exec_user` as execUser, aj.`source`, aj.`thread_count` as threadCount, aj.`param_hash` as paramHash, aj.`config` FROM `autoexec_job` aj WHERE aj.`id` = #{value} for update
SELECT `hash`, `content` FROM `autoexec_job_param_content` where `hash` = #{value} for update
SELECT `hash`, `content` FROM `autoexec_job_param_content` where `hash` = #{value}

SELECT `job_id` as jobId, `job_phase_id` as jobPhaseId, `id`, `name`, `uk`, `type`, `parser`, `exec_mode` as execMode, `fail_policy` as failPolicy, `param_hash` as paramHash FROM `autoexec_job_phase_operation` where `job_id` = #{value}

SELECT `job_id` as jobId, `job_phase_id` as jobPhaseId, `id`, `name`, `uk`, `type`, `parser`, `exec_mode` as execMode, `sort`, `fail_policy` as failPolicy, `param_hash` as paramHash FROM `autoexec_job_phase_operation` where `job_id` = #{jobId} and `job_phase_id` = #{phaseId}
SELECT ajn.`id`, ajn.`host`, ajn.port, ajn.`protocol` AS nodeType FROM `autoexec_job_node` ajn where ajn.job_id = #{jobId} limit #{startNum}, #{pageSize}

SELECT `job_id` as jobId, `job_phase_id` as jobPhaseId, `id`, `name`, `uk`, `type`, `parser`, `exec_mode` as execMode, `fail_policy` as failPolicy, `param_hash` as paramHash FROM `autoexec_job_phase_operation` where `job_id` = #{jobId} and `job_phase_id` = #{jobPhaseId} and `id` = #{jobPhaseOperationId}

SELECT `job_id` as jobId, `job_phase_id` as jobPhaseId, `id`, `name`, `uk`, `type`, `parser`, `exec_mode` as execMode, `fail_policy` as failPolicy, `param_hash` as paramHash, `version_id` as versionId FROM `autoexec_job_phase_operation` where `id` = #{jobPhaseOperationId}
select count(1) from `autoexec_job_phase` where `job_id` = #{value} AND `status` = 'failed'

SELECT ajpn.`id`, ajpn.`job_id` AS jobId, ajpn.`job_phase_id` AS jobPhaseId, ajpn.`host`, ajpn.port, ajpn.`start_time` AS startTime, ajpn.`end_time` AS endTime, ajpn.`status`, ajp.`name` AS jobPhaseName, ajpn.`name` AS nodeName, ajpn.`protocol` AS nodeType, ajpn.`protocol_port` AS protocolPort, ap.`id` AS runnerId, ap.`url` AS runnerUrl FROM `autoexec_job_phase_node` ajpn LEFT JOIN `autoexec_job_phase` ajp ON ajpn.`job_phase_id` = ajp.`id` LEFT JOIN `autoexec_job_phase_node_runner` ajpnr ON ajpn.id = ajpnr.`node_id` LEFT JOIN `autoexec_runner_map` arm ON ajpnr.`runner_map_id` = arm.`id` LEFT JOIN `autoexec_runner` ap ON arm.`runner_id` = ap.`id` where ajpn.`id` = #{nodeId}

SELECT ajpn.`id`, ajpn.`job_id` as jobId, ajpn.`job_phase_id` as jobPhaseId, ajpn.`host`, ajpn.`port`, ajpn.`user_name` as userName, ajpn.`start_time` as startTime, ajpn.`end_time` as endTime, ajpn.`status`, arm.`runner_id` as runnerId FROM `autoexec_job_phase_node` ajpn LEFT JOIN `autoexec_job_phase_node_runner` ajpnr on ajpn.id = ajpnr.`node_id` LEFT JOIN `autoexec_runner_map` arm ON ajpnr.`runner_map_id` = arm.`id` WHERE `job_id` = #{jobId} AND `job_phase_id` = #{phaseId}
SELECT id, job_id as jobId, `name`, `exec_mode` as execMode, `status` FROM `autoexec_job_phase` WHERE `job_id` = #{jobId} and `id` = #{jobPhaseId}

SELECT ajpn.`id`, ajpn.`job_id` AS jobId, ajpn.`job_phase_id` AS jobPhaseId, ajpn.`host`, ajpn.`port`, ajpn.`start_time` AS startTime, ajpn.`end_time` AS endTime, ajpn.`status`, arm.`runner_id` AS runnerId, ajp.`name` AS jobPhaseName FROM `autoexec_job_phase_node` ajpn LEFT JOIN `autoexec_job_phase_node_runner` ajpnr ON ajpn.id = ajpnr.`node_id` LEFT JOIN `autoexec_job_phase` ajp ON ajpn.`job_phase_id` = ajp.`id` LEFT JOIN `autoexec_runner_map` arm ON ajpnr.`runner_map_id` = arm.`id` where ajpn.`job_id` = #{jobId} and ajp.`name` = #{phaseName} and arm.`runner_id` = #{runnerId} and ajpn.`status` not in
#{status}

SELECT ajpn.`id`, ajpn.`job_id` AS jobId, ajpn.`job_phase_id` AS jobPhaseId, ajpn.`host`, ajpn.`port`, ajpn.`start_time` AS startTime, ajpn.`end_time` AS endTime, ajpn.`status` FROM `autoexec_job_phase_node` ajpn where ajpn.`job_id` = #{jobId} and ajpn.`job_phase_id` = #{phaseId} and ajpn.`status` not in
#{status}

SELECT DISTINCT ar.`id`, ar.`name`, ar.`url`, ar.`host`, ar.`port` FROM `autoexec_job_phase_node` ajpn LEFT JOIN `autoexec_job_phase_node_runner` ajpnr ON ajpn.id = ajpnr.`node_id` LEFT JOIN `autoexec_runner_map` arm ON ajpnr.`runner_map_id` = arm.`id` LEFT JOIN `autoexec_runner` ar ON arm.`runner_id` = ar.`id` WHERE ajpn.`job_id` = #{value}

SELECT ar.`id`, ar.`name`, ar.`url`, ar.`host`, ar.`port` FROM `autoexec_job_phase_runner` ajpr LEFT JOIN `autoexec_runner_map` arm ON ajpr.`runner_map_id` = arm.`id` LEFT JOIN `autoexec_runner` ar ON arm.`runner_id` = ar.`id` WHERE ajpr.`job_id` = #{jobId} and ajpr.`job_phase_id` in
#{jobPhaseId}
select count(1) from `autoexec_job_phase_node` WHERE `job_id` = #{value} and `status` = 'running'

SELECT `hash`, `content` FROM `autoexec_job_param_content` where `hash` in
#{hash}

SELECT ajpr.job_phase_id, COUNT(1) as `count` FROM `autoexec_job_phase_runner` ajpr LEFT JOIN `autoexec_job_phase` ajp ON ajpr.`job_phase_id` = ajp.`id` WHERE ajp.`job_id` = #{jobId} AND ajpr.`status` = #{status} GROUP BY ajpr.job_phase_id

SELECT `id`, `job_id` as jobId, `status`, `start_time` as startTime, `end_time` as endTime, `exec_user` as execUser, `exec_mode` as execMode, `name` as name, `error_msg` as errorMsg, `sort`, `uk` as uk FROM `autoexec_job_phase` where `job_id` = #{jobId} and `status` = #{status}
SELECT `name` FROM `autoexec_job_phase` WHERE job_id = #{value} ORDER BY CASE WHEN `status` = 'running' THEN 1 WHEN `status` = 'failed' THEN 2 ELSE 3 END ASC, sort ASC, id ASC LIMIT 1

SELECT ajpn.`id`, ajpn.`job_id` AS jobId, ajpn.`job_phase_id` AS jobPhaseId, ajpn.`host`, ajpn.`port`, ajpn.`start_time` AS startTime, ajpn.`end_time` AS endTime, ajpn.`status` FROM `autoexec_job_phase_node` ajpn where ajpn.`id` in
#{nodeId}
mapper.delete: DELETE ajpnr FROM `autoexec_job_phase_node_runner` ajpnr LEFT JOIN `autoexec_job_phase_node` ajpn ON ajpnr.`node_id` = ajpn.`id` WHERE ajpn.`job_id` = #{value};
